version_description:
- Flight status updates via push notifications are now available on your phone.
- Finding your trips and checking-in on your mobile phone are now easier.
- Overall performance enhancements.

- Flight status updates via push notifications are now available on your phone.
- Finding your trips and checking-in on your mobile phone are now easier.
- Overall performance enhancements.
We've updated checking your flight status and continue to resolve reported bugs based on your feedback!
Bug fixes and enhancements

This release features a brand new way for you to follow your trip on a card by card basis. Each phase in your trip is represented as a card in a timeline of your journey. Just tap on the cards and following the instructions to manage your trip, check in for your flight, see your boarding pass and get departure and arrival information. Have a great mobile journey.

The Allegiant Team

This release features a brand new way for you to follow your trip on a card by card basis. Each phase in your trip is represented as a card in a timeline of your journey. Just tap on the cards and following the instructions to manage your trip, check in for your flight, see your boarding pass and get departure and arrival information. Have a great mobile journey.

The Allegiant Team

When viewing your boarding pass, your screen will automatically brighten to help with the boarding process.
Like the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us improve our app.

The Allegiant Team
New features include automatic updating of your Boarding Pass if there are seating changes and the addition of a Customer Survey to the Mobile App.
This release provides additional tools and options for passengers to more efficiently manage their travel.

* We've made it quicker and easier to check-in if you don't need to make changes to your bags, seats, etc.
* You can now add your Known Traveler Number to your itinerary and benefit from TSA Precheck

* We've made it quicker and easier to check-in if you don't need to make changes to your bags, seats, etc.
* You can now add your Known Traveler Number to your itinerary and benefit from TSA Precheck.
In the case of a cancelled flight, you can now request a refund or switch to a different flight (same airports) directly through the app.

Allegiant now accepts American Express, JCB and Diners Club cards. Also, please be advised that with this release, the Allegiant app will no longer support iOS versions 8.0 and older. Minor bug fixes.

This release enables Allegiant customers to book flights via the mobile app.    Customers will also be able to purchase flight-related options, such as bags, seats, etc.    Allegiant now accepts American Express, JCB and Diners Club cards.    Also, please be advised that with this release, the Allegiant app will no longer support iOS versions 8.0 and older.    Minor bug fixes.
This release includes new features and improvements designed to provide our customers with the most up-to-date information about their flights

This release includes the following upgrades and enhancements: Your timeline will be updated to include any ground transportation and hotel accommodations that are a part of your itinerary.
You will now be notified when boarding for your flight has begun. We have simplified the process for registering for a MyAllegiant account in the Mobile App.
Additional fixes and user improvements.
This release will refine the way the app displays information in certain flight scenarios. Additionally, it includes minor bug fixes and other improvements.
This release contains various enhancements and updates to the Allegiant mobile app that will improve the efficiency of the app for many passengers

This release adds features and improves communication in the app. New features include the addition of your checked bag tag #'s into your trip timeline, the ability to add your mobile Boarding Pass to your Apple Wallet, and notifying you if there is a gate change for your flight.

This release gives passengers the ability to add bags to their itinerary on a flight-by-flight basis. It also increases efficiency in boarding by making it easier to read your mobile boarding pass. You can also now make payments more easily by taking a photo of your card with your device.

This release will ensure a MyAllegiant account holder's flight information is available for automatic download in the app. Please update your app as soon as possible to ensure full functionality in the future.
This release adds a number of new features to the Allegiant mobile app which will provide clearer communications for passengers and the opportunity for providing better feedback to Allegiant.
This release adds a number of new features to the Allegiant mobile app which will provide clearer communications for passengers and the opportunity for providing better feedback to Allegiant.
This release includes minor improvements and enhancements.
This release includes several bug fixes and enhancements to the car rental flow.
This release contains minor bug fixes.
This release fixes a known issue related to updating the app.

This release adds a number of new features to the Allegiant mobile app which :-

• Allow users to manage their trips more independently
• Provides valuable information resources by giving users quick access to frequently asked questions.
• Implements bug fixes and performance enhancements
This release includes minor improvements and enhancements.
This release contains minor bug fixes.

Added the ability to optionally store and maintain payment cards using your myAllegiant account.
- Cards are tokenized and encrypted for enhanced security.
- Add up to four credit / debit cards to your profile to make online purchases easier.
- Set a default card for future purchases.
- Keep your list of stored cards up to date by editing card details or removing unwanted cards.
- Use stored cards to easily book flights and purchase flight add-ons (baggage, priority access, seat upgrades, etc.).

This release includes a number of improvements to the seat selection screen (child, infant scenarios, as well as the new Allegiant Extra seat type). Also, this release includes a new menu access to our privacy policy and a link to apply for the Allegiant Air credit card.
This release includes several bug fixes and enhancements to the car rental flow.

This release includes Saved Travelers in the Allegiant Mobile App. With Saved Travelers, customers can store in their profile a list of individuals that frequently fly together. When booking a flight, these names can be added quickly as passengers. You can access your list of travelers in your profile to add/change/delete.

This release includes support to Bundles in the check-in flow.
Also, we are dropping support for iOS 9.
This release fixes a crash some users were experiencing while viewing their boarding pass.
This release includes minor performance upgrades.
This release includes minor performance upgrades.

Health Acknowledgement at Check-In:
We work closely with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO) and other authorities and experts. Based on their direction, we ensure our actions not only follow current guidance but exceed the recommended standards so customers can fly with confidence. With this update, our passengers will be required to accept a health acknowledgment prior to checking in.
With an attention towards a contactless travel experience for our passengers, we have made the inflight food and beverage menu available for reference on your personal device.
With an attention towards a contactless travel experience for our passengers, we have made the inflight food and beverage menu available for reference on your personal device.
Purchase too many bags? Not a problem! We continue to improve your travel experience by introducing more flexibility to manage your travel and issuing a voucher towards your future travel.
We have made performance enhancements to improve your travel experience. Remember, if you purchase too many bags, you can quickly update your travel in the app.
We have made performance enhancements to improve your travel experience. Remember, if you purchase too many bags, you can quickly update your travel in the app.

Exciting new snack and beverage options on our Fall Onboard Menu. During the month of October, order from a selection of Pink products and we will make a donation to the National Breast Cancer Foundation, Inc.

Exciting new snack and beverage options on our Fall Onboard Menu. During the month of October, order from a selection of Pink products and we will make a donation to the National Breast Cancer Foundation, Inc.
Exciting new beer, cider, coffee, and snack options on our Fall Onboard Menu to enjoy on your upcoming travel.
Support for new Department of Transportation guidelines for travelling with pets.

This release included a redesigned booking process to improve the customer booking experience.
New look and feel with enhanced usability to make the booking process easier for our customers.
Hotel package bookings currently not available. Please visit allegiantair.com to book a hotel package.
Check-in and boarding pass process has not been updated.
